org.pvg.plasmagraph.utils.graphs

Class BarGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pvg.plasmagraph.utils.graphs.BarGraph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Graph

    public class BarGraph
extends java.lang.Object
implements Graph
    Graph class.

    Contains all the methods required to take in data of any kind that the

    rest of the system may provide it and shape it into a proper graph

    according to the settings in the Template.

    Manages the graphing of any and all Bar Charts.

    It is important to note that this class, as of 4/15/2014, DOES NOT WORK.

    The class is currently non-functional due to changes in the DataSet and lack of

    support in the tools available.

    Author:
    Plasma Visualization Group
